ta.title: பெருவாலா - உவா பரணகமாவின் தேர்தலின் வத்தலா -த ut தா முடிவுகள்

en.title: Beruwala - Wattala-Dautha Results of Election of Uva Paranagama

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the election results in 200 characters:

Beruwala: SLPP wins 2 seats, UNP 1 seat, JVP 1 seat. Wattala-Dautha: SLPP takes 3 seats, UNP 1 seat. Uva Paranagama: SLPP leads with 4 seats, UNP 2 seats. Overall, SLPP maintains strong presence in these areas.
